attributes.action: Bring any person/inc MPs to the criminal court if they have been found to defraud the company IE the British people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the present prime minister,his government, the opposition, and all other sitting political parties to acknowledge that we will no longer accept being stolen from.Any company who had found its empoyees to be defrauding ie claiming un-worthy or fraudulent expenses would be sacked and face criminal charges...we as a tax payers expect the same

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
